strengths_and_skills: Resilience and reform: rebuilt life after addictions to alcohol, tobacco, pornography, gambling, choosing sobriety and healing despite painful losses.
Spiritual leadership focused on the Scriptures (especially Alma), Melchizedek Priesthood service, and guiding others toward higher ground.
Commitment to honesty, loyalty, and self-awareness; expects truthfulness and models transparency about struggles and priorities.
Creation and mentorship through SeedKate, blending technical insight with mythic storytelling to provide calm, loyal support.
